sk1.name: Frost Arrows
sk1.desc: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement. Lasts 1.5 seconds on Heroes, and 7 seconds on creeps.Frost Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

sk2.name: Gust
sk2.desc: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

sk3.name: Precision Aura
sk3.desc: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units on the map based on a percentage of Drow's agility. Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

sk4.name: Marksmanship
sk4.desc: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within a 400 AoE.
